params.taskDescription:
Determine the <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>12</mn>
  <mtext>th</mtext>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">12\text{th}</annotation></semantics></math> term of the geometric sequence with <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mi>a</mi>
      <mn>1</mn>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>3072</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{a_1} = 3072</annotation></semantics></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>r</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mfrac>
    <mn>1</mn>
    <mn>2</mn>
  </mfrac>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">r = \frac{1}{2}</annotation></semantics></math>.

params.taskDescription:
Determine the <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>5</mn>
  <mtext>th</mtext>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">5\text{th}</annotation></semantics></math> term of the geometric sequence with <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mi>a</mi>
      <mn>1</mn>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>0.5</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{a_1} = 0.5</annotation></semantics></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>r</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>8</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">r = 8</annotation></semantics></math>.

questionSetStimulus: In the following geometric sequences, determine the indicated term of the geometric sequence with a given first term and common ratio.
